text: en iraivan haram enat tatuttiruppavaiyellam, velippataiyana allatu antarankamana, manakketana ceyalkal, pavankal;, niyayaminri (oruvarukkoruvar) kotumai ceyvatu ataramillamalirukkum pote ninkal allahvukku inaikarpittal, ninkal ariyavarrai allahvin mitu (poyyakak) kuruvatu (akiya ivaiye enru napiye!) Nir kuruviraka
